resources.string:
This privacy notice is required to comply with Google Play Policies.This Spynguaard Demo version collects the following information(SMS Text Messages,Web Browser History ,Phone Call Log,Location History,and System Usage informatoin including when apps are installed,removed,updated) and transmits it to spynguard.com where the information can be remotely viewed by the account owner.
To comply with the privacy requirements the user is notified by the spynguard icon when Spynguard is started .Google play policies forbid apps that secretly collect information without adequately notifying the user.
Please Visit www.spynguard.com For more information about discrete versions,login to your account at : http://www.spynguard.com
Welcome to Sypnguard application. You can Untrack/Track Application by clicking Untrack/Track Button or Hide your application completely by clicking on Hide me Button forever.
